I absolutely love their pizza (home made crust!) we have gone multiple times, and everything has been outstanding. I love their gnoqui. Review by - Yelp Kelly F: Great place for lunch. We had the spaghetti and meatball ($8) and chicken park ($10). Both were very good. Nice atmosphere and clean. Reasonable prices. I'll be back. Ravioli, soup and salad were great. Review by - Yelp Gerry R: We have been here from NYC FOR 18 months and have been underwhelmed with the Italian food here Well tonight we "came home" and had an excellent meal served by a Pro! Bravo LIDI WE will be back!!! Review by - Yelp Tiffany C: This is our favorite Italian spot in Charleston. Everything is made from scratch and cooked to perfection. The braised veal short ribs are to die for. Stuffed mushrooms, calamari, and sausage and pea fettuccine Alfredo are a must. And Don't forget the espresso martini for dessert! You won't regret visiting LIDI. Review by - Yelp Stephanie D: Dropped by after a concert for a app and drink. Food was delicious and the drinks were on point! Quentin and Cody were great. Cozy atmosphere and the staff were energetic and professional! We will certainly be back!
